name: Lion
title: Demon Witch
lore: Once a master sorcerer who sought dark power, Lion traded his soul to demons multiple times.

earthSpike.name: Earth Spike
earthSpike.description: Rock spikes burst from the earth, stunning and damaging enemies in a line.

hex.name: Hex
hex.description: Transforms an enemy into a harmless frog, disabling all abilities and reducing movement speed.

manaDrain.name: Mana Drain
manaDrain.description: Channels to drain mana from an enemy, slowing them. Deals damage based on mana drained.

fingerOfDeath.name: Finger of Death
fingerOfDeath.description: Rips at an enemy with pure magical energy, dealing massive damage. Damage increases per kill.
